overview: Mrs. Lovely is a woman who has somehow been fooled into believing confessing that she would like to be loved, and how she would like to be loved is a sign of weakness. There is a couple who built a house right across from hers and have planted a beautiful garden that has grown so large it has begun to take over her home and lock her in. While watching the couple tend to their garden, the walls of her internalized prison begin to break down and she canâ€™t help but talk about not only the love she wants, but demands.
title: Mrs. Lovely
